summary: An ordinance relating to the municipal light and power plant and system; authorizing agreements with the United States of America, Dept. of Interior, acting by and through the Bonneville Power Administrator, the Washington Public Power Supply System, and PUD No. 1 of Clark County for purchase by the City of a portion of the electric power output of the Hanford New Production Reactor Project and for an exchange and allocation of power in connection therewith.
